title: The LTV Secrets of Subscription Top Performers
summary: This page discusses the importance of Lifetime Value (LTV) for subscription businesses, highlighting that companies measuring LTV are significantly more likely to be top performers. It introduces a webinar featuring FlexPay's SVP of Marketing and Director of Innovation, who share insights on LTV measurement, operational efficiency, customer retention, and growth strategies.
key_points: Subscription companies measuring LTV are 8X more likely to be top performers.
LTV management directly impacts business performance and growth.
The page promotes a webinar discussing LTV measurement, operational efficiency, and customer retention strategies.
Key speakers include Steve Arentzoff (SVP of Marketing, FlexPay) and Jeffrey Pauletto (Director of Innovation, FlexPay).
